thread.title: Standing ovation for these rebellious teenage transformations (24 Photos)
thread.title_full: Standing ovation for these rebellious teenage transformations (24 Photos)

author: Kayla
title: Standing ovation for these rebellious teenage transformations (24 Photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
Everyone has some awkward stage in their existence where they wish they could forget. For most people that’s in middle school or high school when we’re all trying to “find ourselves.” Well these people definitely found themselves, and the transformations are awesome! 
Emo girls to smokin’ hot girls, scene guys to police officers, punkers into corporate employees — it’s all in here. 2 
Before: 2005 my 18-year-old emo self. After: 2015 I am a loving father and husband. What a difference 10 years can make. 3 
I’m a tax consultant at a bog-four accounting firm. 4 
I’m working towards an Associates Degree in mortuary science. 5 
Early 2000s vs now. I’m in the U.S. Military now as an MP. specifically U.S. Air Force. Advertisement Advertisement 6 
This was me in my emo days green hair and everything. Now I work a corporate job to pay my studies as a web developer and designer. I am a part-time tattooed model and aspiring actress. 7 
Emo. Goth. Emo. Emo. Marketing Consultant. 8 
I’m a proper grown up now working as a trainer for the bank, buying my first property, paying the mortgage. Still feel like a filthy wee emo though. 9 
Then I was studying to become a designer listening to Blink, Death Cab, and Brand New. Now I’m a designer listening to Blink, Death Cab, and Brand New and having my first kid. 10 
I’m a special education teacher to high school freshmen. I teach kids like I was not to do the things I did. So far, so good. Me in 9th grade vs me teaching 9th grade. Advertisement
